Symbol.Script_1D:
! kuten kirjasto 23:n DetlevelFunctionMacro
! ============================================================================= ! 3D Detail Level ! =============================================================================
! iDetlevel3D: DETLEVEL_3D_MVO = 1 DETLEVEL_3D_SCSENS = 2 ! Unused DETLEVEL_3D_DETAILED = 3 DETLEVEL_3D_SIMPLE = 4 DETLEVEL_3D_DRAFT = 5 DETLEVEL_3D_OFF = 6 DETLEVEL_3D_CALLED = 7
dim stDetlevel3D[7] stDetlevel3D[1] = `Esitystavan mukaan` stDetlevel3D[2] = `Mittakaavan mukainen` stDetlevel3D[3] = `Täysi` stDetlevel3D[4] = `Yksinkertaistettu` stDetlevel3D[5] = `Kaaviomainen` stDetlevel3D[6] = `Pois` stDetlevel3D[7] = `Kutsuttu`
! ============================================================================= ! 2D Detail Level ! =============================================================================
! iDetlevel2D: DETLEVEL_2D_MVO = 1 DETLEVEL_2D_SCSENS = 2 DETLEVEL_2D_DETAILED = 3 DETLEVEL_2D_SIMPLE = 4 DETLEVEL_2D_DRAFT = 5 DETLEVEL_2D_SYMBOLIC = 6 DETLEVEL_2D_CALLED = 7
dim stDetlevel2D[7] stDetlevel2D[1]= `Esitystavan mukaan` stDetlevel2D[2] = `Mittakaavan mukainen` stDetlevel2D[3] = `Täysi` stDetlevel2D[4] = `Keskitaso` stDetlevel2D[5] = `Matala` stDetlevel2D[6] = `Symboli` stDetlevel2D[7] = `Kutsuttu`
Symbol.Script_UI:
rivivali = 22 tab = 600/4-10
outlev = tab-5 outkor = rivivali-3 inlev = tab-10 inkor = rivivali-3
ui_dialog "Esitystapa", 600, 8*rivivali
x = 10 y = 10
ui_style 0,1 ui_outfield "2D-esitys" ,x, y, outlev,outkor ui_style 0,0 y=y+rivivali
ui_outfield `Detaljitaso ` ,x ,y,outlev ,outkor ui_infield{4} "iDetlevel2D" ,x+tab ,y,inlev ,inkor, 8, "", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, "", stDetlevel2D[DETLEVEL_2D_DETAILED],DETLEVEL_2D_DETAILED, "", stDetlevel2D[DETLEVEL_2D_SIMPLE], DETLEVEL_2D_SIMPLE, "", stDetlevel2D[DETLEVEL_2D_DRAFT], DETLEVEL_2D_DRAFT y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Ääriviivan kynä" ,x ,y, outlev ,outkor UI_INFIELD "gs_cont_pen" ,x+tab ,y, inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Ääriviivan tyyppi" ,x ,y, outlev ,outkor UI_INFIELD "gs_line_type" ,x+tab ,y, inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Symbolin täyte" ,x ,y, outlev ,outkor UI_INFIELD "gs_fill" ,x+tab ,y, inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
!IF gs_fill THEN
UI_OUTFIELD "Täytteen tyyppi" ,x ,y, outlev ,outkor, 4*not(gs_fill) UI_INFIELD "gs_fill_type" ,x+tab ,y, inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Täytteen kynä" ,x ,y, outlev ,outkor, 4*not(gs_fill) UI_INFIELD "gs_fill_pen" ,x+tab ,y, inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Täytteen taustakynä",x ,y, outlev ,outkor, 4*not(gs_fill) UI_INFIELD "gs_back_pen" ,x+tab ,y, inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
!ENDIF x = 600/2 y = 10
ui_style 0,1 ui_outfield "3D-esitys" ,x, y, outlev,outkor ui_style 0,0 y=y+rivivali
ui_outfield `Detaljitaso`,x ,y,outlev ,outkor ui_infield{4} "iDetlevel3D" ,x+tab ,y,inlev ,inkor, 8, "", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, "", stDetlevel3D[DETLEVEL_3D_DETAILED],DETLEVEL_3D_DETAILED, "", stDetlevel3D[DETLEVEL_3D_SIMPLE], DETLEVEL_3D_SIMPLE, "", stDetlevel3D[DETLEVEL_3D_DRAFT], DETLEVEL_3D_DRAFT y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Kaarten tarkkuus" ,x ,y, outlev ,outkor UI_INFIELD "res" ,x+tab ,y, inlev/2 ,inkor y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "3D-kynä" ,x ,y, outlev ,outkor, 4*esitystavan_mukainen UI_INFIELD "gs_view_pen" ,x+tab ,y, inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Rautalanka" ,x ,y, outlev ,outkor, 4*esitystavan_mukainen UI_INFIELD "rautalanka" ,x+tab ,y, inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Varjot" ,x ,y, outlev ,outkor, 4*esitystavan_mukainen UI_INFIELD "varjot" ,x+tab ,y, inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
Symbol.Script_VL:
if not(gs_fill) then lock "gs_fill_type" lock "gs_fill_pen" lock "gs_back_pen" endif
values{2} "iDetlevel2D" \!DETLEVEL_3D_MVO , stDetlevel3D[DETLEVEL_3D_MVO ] , DETLEVEL_3D_SCSENS , stDetlevel3D[DETLEVEL_3D_SCSENS ] , DETLEVEL_3D_DETAILED , stDetlevel3D[DETLEVEL_3D_DETAILED] , DETLEVEL_3D_SIMPLE , stDetlevel3D[DETLEVEL_3D_SIMPLE ] , DETLEVEL_3D_DRAFT , stDetlevel3D[DETLEVEL_3D_DRAFT ] , DETLEVEL_3D_OFF , stDetlevel3D[DETLEVEL_3D_OFF ] !DETLEVEL_3D_CALLED , stDetlevel3D[DETLEVEL_3D_CALLED ]
values{2} "iDetlevel3D" \!DETLEVEL_2D_MVO , stDetlevel2D[DETLEVEL_2D_MVO ] , DETLEVEL_2D_SCSENS , stDetlevel2D[DETLEVEL_2D_SCSENS ] , DETLEVEL_2D_DETAILED , stDetlevel2D[DETLEVEL_2D_DETAILED] , DETLEVEL_2D_SIMPLE , stDetlevel2D[DETLEVEL_2D_SIMPLE ] , DETLEVEL_2D_DRAFT , stDetlevel2D[DETLEVEL_2D_DRAFT ] , DETLEVEL_2D_SYMBOLIC , stDetlevel2D[DETLEVEL_2D_SYMBOLIC] !DETLEVEL_2D_CALLED , stDetlevel2D[DETLEVEL_2D_CALLED ]
Symbol.Comment:
© M.A.D. 2019
191209 hema luotu: määrälistan tyyppi ja 2D/3D-esitystavat.
